mapper.sql: select notice_no, member_no, group_no, title, content, create_date, view_count from nm_notice
mapper.insert: insert into nm_notice( group_no, member_no, title, content ) values( #{groupNo}, #{memberNo}, #{title}, #{content} )
mapper.select:
select notice_no, member_no, title, create_date, view_count from nm_notice
order by notice_no desc

select notice_no, member_no, group_no, title, content, create_date, view_count from nm_notice
where notice_no=#{noticeNo}
mapper.update: update nm_notice set group_no=#{groupNo}, member_no=#{memberNo}, title=#{title}, content=#{content} where notice_no=#{noticeNo}
